text: Tini balalena -- ''tomara bherike tara bheridera sange dabi kare se tomara prati alabat an'yaya kareche. Nihsandeha ansidaradera madhyera aneke'i -- tadera ke'u ke'u an'yera prati satruta kare, tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, ara yara temana tara alpasankhyaka.â€™â€™ Ara da'uda bhebechilena ye amara niscaya'i tamke pariksa karachilama, sejan'ya tini tamra prabhura kache paritrana khujamchilena, ara tini lutiye paralena anata haye ebam barabara phirate thakalena.
